title: The Enixar: Solitude of Sin
description: A young stable boy through a series of unfortunate events is whisked into a rescue mission to save a kidnapped princess from the clutches of a rebel group of ancient origins'?----------------------Princess Athena discovers the universe is far stranger than she ever thought. One day she is living a fairytale life. The next she becomes a gateway between her kingdom and Alpha Sinteres- a higher plane of existence and source of unlimited magic.The only problem is that there are people who would do anything to get their hands on such potential. A power-hungry autocrat and his surprising alliances can't resist but to try and use the princess as a weapon to get control over the kingdom of Gramadon.Ruil never dreamed he would make the transition from ordinary stable boy to the leader and sole member of a rescue mission in one night. An exciting adventure is thrust upon him whether he is ready or not.It used to be that every princess needs to be rescued by a hero. This time it's the other way around.
author: Mikkell K. Khan
